ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition
form = widget.ProviderWidget if form == None: return entity = form.Entity if entity == None: return status = int(entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value)
if (status != 1 and status != 4): widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False

def InitializeRow(entity, row):
from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerContext from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityBase from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Criteria from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import QuerySource from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Parameter
conta = Entity.GetFirstOrDefault(EntityDefinition.GetByName("CN_PRECONTRATOS"), Criteria(" A.STATUS IN (1,4) AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT PRECONTRATO FROM CN_PRECONTRATOOBJETOS WHERE HANDLE = :HANDLE) ",Parameter("HANDLE",entity.Fields["HANDLE"])))
if conta == None : if row.EditCommand != None: row.EditCommand.Visible = False if row.DeleteCommand != None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = False
